title: Ep. 11. Murder on the Rockport Limited - Chapter Two
description: Our heroes attempt to make the best out of a swampy situation, and race to Rockport before they miss a fateful train. They also meet a beloved radio personality and spokesperson, and hold him ransom for MaxFunDrive donations. Magnus exhibits his upper body strength. Taako gets charming. Merle takes a stink-bath.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
